thanks Jim, Rich et al,

I also want to mention that Jim is absolutely correct in thinking the 
upside down Fuji on th ereverse side as reflection.
With tsuba in hand, I can see waves around the mountain ( even though 
the pictures on the web site do not show it ).

milt
